title: Ensure site logo branding is CCS

requirements.text: Ensure the site uses the CCS logo consistently in all primary branding locations by using the generated CCS logo assets in the header navigation brand area, the footer brand block, and the HTML favicon.
acceptanceCriteria: Header brand area renders the CCS logo icon from /assets/generated/ccs-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png.
Footer brand area renders the CCS logo icon from /assets/generated/ccs-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png.
The browser tab/favicon uses /assets/generated/ccs-favicon.dim_64x64.png via frontend/index.html.
All logo elements have English alt text that references Complete Construction Solutions (CCS).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
nonGoals: Changing contact information, phone numbers, WhatsApp links, or form behavior.
Adding new authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.

edits: Create a new square icon logo asset from the uploaded logo (kk-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png > ccs-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png)
Create a new horizontal logo lockup asset from the uploaded logo (kk-logo-horizontal.dim_800x240.png > ccs-logo-horizontal.dim_800x240.png)
Create a new favicon derived from the uploaded logo (king-kingdom-favicon.dim_64x64.png > ccs-favicon.dim_64x64.png)
